results.name: Product_{k>=1} ((1 + x^k)^a(k)) = 1 + 4x.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
N. J. A. Sloane, Weigh transform
formula: Dirichlet convolution of A038065 with characteristic function of powers of 2.
a(n) = (1/n)*(-(-4)^n + Sum_{d<n and d|n} (-1)^(n/d)*d*a(d)). - _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 23 2018
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
